') matching_date, m.matching_permission_gender, m.matching_status, m.matching_hits, m.matching_reg_date, g.game_name_ko, sd.sido_name, sg.sigungu_name FROM matching m LEFT OUTER JOIN game g ON m.game_no = g.game_no LEFT OUTER JOIN sido sd ON m.sido_code = sd.sido_code LEFT OUTER JOIN sigungu sg ON m.sigungu_code = sg.sigungu_code
WHERE
m.matching_status || m.matching_permission_gender || sd.sido_name || sg.sigungu_name LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
ORDER BY m.matching_no DESC
SELECT sg.sido_code, sd.sido_name, sg.sigungu_code, sg.sigungu_name FROM sigungu sg LEFT OUTER JOIN sido sd ON sg.sido_code = sd.sido_code WHERE sg.sido_code = #{ sidoCode }
SELECT g.theme_no, t.theme_name, g.game_no, g.game_name_ko FROM game g LEFT OUTER JOIN theme t ON g.theme_no = t.theme_no WHERE g.theme_no = #{ themeNo }

SELECT m.matching_no, mg.user_no, m.matching_title, m.matching_status, to_char(m.matching_reg_date, 'yyyy. mm. dd.') matching_reg_date FROM matching m LEFT OUTER JOIN matching_group mg ON m.matching_no = mg.matching_no WHERE mg.user_no = #{ userNo }
